demos.title: GitHub Stars - Permission Mode
demos.description: Navigate to browser-use repository and extract star count with user permission controls
demos.task: Navigate to browser use repo and extract the number of stars

demos.title: Blog Post Interaction - AWI Mode
demos.description: Fetch top blog posts and comment on the most popular using AWI structured API
demos.task: Navigate to the blog post website - fetch the top three posts and post a comment on the most popular post
